member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.ByGazeTimePointProcessor.Filters.SelectionFilter`1
member.summary: Defines the abstract SelectionFilter type. This type filters the received points as necessary and executes any commands (selects) accordingly. After filtering and selecting, the original point collection may (should) be updated if necessary to avoid multiple selections.
member.typeparam: The type of the point collection.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.ByGazeTimePointProcessor.Filters.SelectionFilter`1.#ctor(System.Windows.Window)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.ByGazeTimePointProcessor.Filters.SelectionFilter`1.SelectAndUpdate(`0)
member.summary: Filters the collection, selects accordingly and returns an updated collection.

member.name: P:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.ByGazeTimePointProcessor.Filters.SelectionFilter`1.Window
member.summary: Gets or sets the window on which the controls for the points are located.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The window on which the selectable controls are located.
The time frame from current time during which points must have fallen to be considered.
The number of points required for activation.
